post.text: Trump has a history of boasting about his donations to charityâ€”and little history of seriously donating to charity.

comment.author: Jacob
comment.text: Comey needs to watch his back. MANY who have taken on the Clinton's have mysteriously died and/or "disappeared" from the face of the Earth; including two teenage boys who supposedly smoked a little too much weed and "accidentally fell asleep" directly in the path of an oncoming train. It may get even more ugly before its over.....

replies.author: David
replies.text: howe come Donald is still around........
